select h.HOUSE_SERIAL, h.HOUSEFILTER_RANGE, h.HOUSEFILTER_GUEST_NUMBER, h.HOUSEFILTER_TYPE, h.HOUSEFILTER_ROOM_NUMBER, h.HOUSEFILTER_LOCATION, h.HOUSEFILTER_BEDROOM_NUMBER, h.HOUSEFILTER_BATHROOM_NUMBER, h.HOUSEFILTER_BED_NUMBER, h.HOUSEFILTER_CHECKIN_TERM, h.HOUSEFILTER_CHECKIN_START, h.HOUSEFILTER_CHECKIN_END, h.HOUSEFILTER_RESERVATION_TERM, h.HOUSEFILTER_BAK_MIN, h.HOUSEFILTER_BAK_MAX, h.HOUSEFILTER_PRICE from HOUSEFILTER h, SHUTDOWN, CHECKLIST
